lines.text: Am I employing retards? I have nothing against retards in general, I just can't afford to employ them.
What's, like, your take on heaven.
Most people have some dignity, most people long to leave a mark. If it were just a question of smudges... they wouldn't need the bowling shoe rule.
So where you from?
It's a long story.
I've got all night
You'd need all night.
Well I've got all night.
Everyone's special.
Well I've heard that one too.
It's what I believe. All I believe. Every human life...
So you're one of those huh?
One of what?
A humanist.
Hey earl, we need your trunk.
[Earl shakes his head]
C'mon the guy's wrapped. There won't be any leakage.
Each time you turn your back, a few more... gone, makes you want to withdraw.
Yeah, well. Can't go through life afraid to connect 'cos the thing might end, right?
Not might.
